sen.j: 西園寺実尚（さいおんじ さねなお、正保2年（1645年）‐万治3年12月29日 (旧暦)（1661年1月29日））は、江戸時代前期の公家。
sen.e: Sanenao SAIONJI (1645 - January 29, 1661) was Kuge (court noble) in the early Edo period.
Sanenao SAIONJI (1645 - January 29, 1661) was Kuge (a Court Noble) in the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: court noble→a Court Nobleに訂正しました。
sen.e: Sanenao SAIONJI (1645 - January 29, 1661) was Kuge (a Court Noble) in the early Edo period.

sen.j: 主に後西天皇（111代）の代の朝廷に仕えた。
sen.e: He mostly served the Imperial Court at the reign of Emperor Gosai (111th).
He primarily served for the sovereign of the 111th Emperor Gosai in the Imperial Court.
sen.cmt: mostly→primarily, served the Imperial Court at the reign of → for the sovereign of the 111th Emperor Gosai in the Imperial Courtに訂正しました。
sen.e: He primarily served for the sovereign of the 111th Emperor Gosai in the Imperial Court.

sen.j: 父は中納言西園寺公満。
sen.e: His father was Chunagon (vice-councilor of state) Kinmitsu SAIONJI.
His father was Chunagon (Vice-Councilor of State) Kinmitsu SAIONJI.
sen.cmt: 役職の単語の頭文字を大文字にしました。
sen.e: His father was Chunagon (Vice-Councilor of State) Kinmitsu SAIONJI.
His mother was a daughter of Yasushige Matsudaira.
His mother was a daughter of Yasushige MATSUDAIRA.
His mother was a daughter of Yasushige MATSUDAIRA.

sen.j: 正四位近衛府まで昇ったが、万治3年（1661年）に16歳という若さで死去している。
sen.e: Although he was promoted to Shoshii Konoefu (Senior Fourth Rank, the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), he died at an early age of 16, in 1661.
Although he was promoted to up Shoshii Konoefu (Senior Fourth Rank and the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), he died young at the age of 16 in 1661.
sen.cmt: upを追加しました。Andを追加しました。died at an early age→died young at the ageに訂正しました。
sen.e: Although he was promoted to up Shoshii Konoefu (Senior Fourth Rank and the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), he died young at the age of 16 in 1661.

sen.j: 子も室もなかったので、西園寺家は叔父の西園寺公宣が相続した。
sen.e: As he didn't have a wife and any children, his uncle Kinnobu SAIONJI succeeded to the Saionji family.
As he didn't have either a wife or any children, his uncle Kinnobu SAIONJI succeeded to him and became heir to the Saionji family.
sen.cmt: 文法ミスです。either, orを追加しました。succeeded to the Saionji family→succeeded to him and became heir to the Saionji familyに訂正しました。
sen.e: As he didn't have either a wife or any children, his uncle Kinnobu SAIONJI succeeded to him and became heir to the Saionji family.
